thread.title: LeBron James knocks over and then picks up Kyrie Irving while still grabbing a rebound
thread.title_full: LeBron James knocks over and then picks up Kyrie Irving while still grabbing a rebound

author: Whitney Medworth
title: LeBron James knocks over and then picks up Kyrie Irving while still grabbing a rebound
text:
Classic, LeBron.
Some say that LeBron James does everything for his teams, and they might be correct. On this play LeBron went for a rebound, knocked over Kyrie Irving , helped him up, and still got the board.
James tallied his 10th triple double of the season against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday, which is a career high for him in a season. He finished the night with 16 points, 11 rebounds, and 12 assists.
The Cleveland Cavaliers were in charge all night, scoring 103 points through the first three quarters. Cleveland went on to beat Detroit, 128-96.
